sideCard.quote: “Be curious. Read widely. Try new things. What people say intelligence just boils down to curiosity.”
sideCard.author: Aaron Swartz

overview.title: Hello
overview.content: I am Satyavrat. I love to code and create things from scratch. I live in Salt Lake City, Utah.

experience.headline: Infrastructure System Analyst, Select Portfolio Servicing
Web Designer, Arizona State University
experience.description: Designed the web application for Power Electronics and Control Engineering Lab at ASU using HTML, CSS and ReactJS. Implemented continuous deployment from Github using Netlify and included easy maintainability features like adaptive JSON-based rendering.

experience.headline: Graduate Teaching assistant, Arizona State University
experience.description: Grading and reinforcing lessons for the courses - Programming with Python, Unix Utilities & Shell Scripting and Database. Management Systems. Worked closely with multiple professors for reviewing material for undergraduate courses of 40+ students.

experience.headline: Software Engineer Intern, Select Portfolio Servicing
experience.description: Designed and developed an end to end system for collecting load balanced server configurations from the in-house Data Center and checking it for inconsistencies. Utilized Windows PowerShell to create remotely executable scripts, interfaced with Citrix NetScaler Load Balancers using REST API’s and used SQL to store and detect misconfigurations

experience.headline: Decision Analytics Associate at ZS Associates, Gurgaon, India
experience.description: Involved in data analysis and forecasting on patient level data for Oncology(cancer) drugs for Pfizer. Utilized SQL and R for data extraction from Teradata and Aginity Servers and further used Advanced MS-Excel and Tableau for data visualization and reporting.

experience.headline: Patent Engineer Associate Intern at UnitedLex, Gurgaon, India
experience.description: Conducted patentability searches for different ideas presented and documented by leading software companies and assessed the scope for new R&D opportunities. Utilized tools like Orbit intelligence, Google Patents and Google Scholar. Researched and published a blog on 5G technologies for a recognized technical website.

experience.headline: Software Development Intern at DRDO, New Delhi, India
experience.description: Designed a software application for tectonic fault activity detection using exclusive satellite imagery using C++. Enabled cross-platform development by utilizing Qt. Application has witnessed significant usage in Research applications

content.para: Utilized four different kinds of classifiers - Logistic Regression, K Nearest Neighbors, Decision Trees and Random Forests to predict Credit Card Delinquents in a dataset
The project involved the use of a skewed dataset and refining it by undersampling using dimensionality reduction
Developed a Deep Learning - Convolutional Neural Network(CNN) to recognize handwritten numbers with ~99% accuracy.
Utilized Python TensorFlow and MNIST’s handwritten digit database of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images.
Made use of the Rectified Linear Unit(RELU) function and Adam Optimizer to improve predictions

projectDescription.Title: Fully Homomorphic Encryption based computation of cholesterol risk

content.para: Performed a Fully Homomorphic based computation of the heart disease risk given the cholesterol using a fog node.
Computations are performed using a fog node with Amazon S3 bucket for cloud data storage
The process aims at developing an environment where a patient may be able to confidentially evaluate his/her Cholestrol risk where the details are encrypted at all times
Designed an Augmented Reality Android application for city planning using live maps and location data
Inspired by densely populated cities like Hong Kong where the real estate can be managed better. The intent is to help better plan new cities by mapping them out on a real time map
Used Blender to create features like buildings, skyscrapers and gas stations. Utilized Mapbox in Unity to provide real time maps
A user can place buildings on the map and plan out cities better

projects.headline: Research Data Management and Visualization System

projectDescription.Title: Research Data Management and Visualization System

content.para: Designed a website for retrieval, consolidation and visualization of photovoltaic efficiency research data in a team of 4 members.
It is a web platform which will enable clients to create & manage accounts, upload and consolidate data, and visualize their research data through charts, graphs and plot lines
It solves the challenge to consolidate research data collected from different manual sources and represent it
Technologies employed are Python - Django(back-end), Angular JS (front end), AWS-S3 and Google charts.
